trans-unit.source: Provides configuration options for the workflow designer.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the annotation is enabled for the Flowchart designer and the StateMachine designer.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the annotation is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether auto-connect is enabled for the Flowchart designer and the StateMachine designer.
The default value is `false`.
But when the designer is hosted in Visual Studio, the value is set to `true` automatically.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if auto-connect is enabled for the Flowchart designer and the StateMachine designer; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether auto-split is enabled for the Flowchart designer and the StateMachine designer.
The default value is `false`.
But when the designer is hosted in Visual Studio, the value is set to `true` automatically.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if auto-split is enabled for the Flowchart designer and the StateMachine designer; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether auto-surround with sequence is enabled.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if auto-surround with sequence is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether background validation is enabled.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if background validation is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether loading from untrusted source is enabled.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if loading from untrusted source is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether multiple items context menu is enabled.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if multiple items context menu is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether multiple items drag-and-drop operation is enabled.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if multiple items drag-and-drop operation is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether namespace conversion is enabled.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if namespace conversion is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether pan mode is enabled.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if pan mode is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether rubber band selection is enabled.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if rubber band selection is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets the name of the target .NET Framework.
The name of the target .NET Framework.
